title: 2879 weird power problem
message: Have a 2879 when Camera/Bluetooth is plugged in, won't power on. when unplugged, turns on and boots fine. Ideas?

title: 2879 weird power problem
message:
i find these common problems on core2duo macbooks. these old isight/wifi cable has gone bad.

i would check which line is shorted to ground when you plug the cable.

title: 2879 weird power problem
message:
First remove the conductive sponge from the airport cable.
If still not powers up, then check resistance to ground on L3404/05, with cable connected of course.
Usually camera issue...
